name: 29th World Congress on Nursing care
content: This is John Williams from nursing care congress 2022 The Organizing Committee is pleased to invite you to participate in the “29th World Congress on Nursing care” to be held on May 23-24, 2022, in Bangkok, Thailand, on the theme "Innovations in Nursing and Improving Health through Nursing Research". For more details visit: https://nursingcare.nursingconference.com/asia-pacific/ Email: midwiferywomenhealth123@gmail.com or midwifery@asiameets.com
